availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Basye (Oldham County, KY, hotel keeper)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, farmer and hotel keeper. Virginia native. Son of Benjamin Basye and Ruth Tapp Basye. Married Frances Patsy Hitt Basye in January 1849 in Oldham County. Father of Sophia Basye and Lucy Basye. Owned two enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1850. Farmer in Oldham County in 1850. Hotel keeper in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, District 1, p. 164B.
